hooks.name: gk/gravitymaps/loaded
hooks.description: Fires when the plugin is loaded.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymaps/render/map-canvas
hooks.description: Fires during render map canvas processing.

hooks.name: gravityview/template/map/body/after
gravityview/template/map/body/before
sprintf(gravityview/template/map/entry%safter, $zone)
sprintf(gravityview/template/map/entry%sbefore, $zone)
gk/gravitymaps/current_location_instant_search
hooks.description: Allows changing of the default setting for the Current Location behavior.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymaps/geolocation_fields
hooks.description: Allows filtering of which fields are considered geolocation fields.

parameters.name: form
parameters.description: Which Gravity Forms meta we are using.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymaps/geolocation_radius_options
hooks.description: Allow modifications to the geolocation radius options.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Which options we are passing forward.

parameters.name: default_options
parameters.description: Which are the default options that will be applied afterwords.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymaps/map-services/google-maps/api_key

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: If the Google API key setting is set in GravityView Settings, use it. Otherwise: ''.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymaps/map/control-pagination
hooks.description: Filter the pagination control setting for the map.

parameters.name: pagination_override
parameters.description: Whether to override the View's native pagination behavior.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymaps/maps/service-factory/get-map-service-class-for-view
hooks.description: Filters the default map instance value.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymaps/maps/service-factory/get-map-service-instance-for-view
gk/gravitymaps/marker/auto-geocode
hooks.description: Controls whether the marker is automatically geocoded if no coordinates are found.

parameters.name: auto_geocode
parameters.description: Whether the marker should be automatically geocoded if no coordinates are found.

hooks.name: gk/gravitymaps/markers/coordinates/fields-ids
hooks.description: Filters the lat long fields value.

parameters.name: lat_long_fields
parameters.description: Array of latitude/longitude of Gravity Forms field IDs

hooks.name: gk/gravitymaps/search/reserved-args
hooks.description: Modifies the reserved arguments for the Search Bar widget.

hooks.name: gravityview_maps_google_script_handle
gravityview_render_after_label
gravityview/maps/available_icons/icons

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: If set, the key value of the $entry array that holds the icon

parameters.name: icons
parameters.description: Array of icons, with keys of default, theme, and plugin. The keys must match the array keys used by $sections.

hooks.name: gravityview/maps/available_icons/sections

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: If set, the key value of the $entry array that holds the icon

parameters.name: icons
parameters.description: Array of icons, with keys of default, theme, and plugin.

hooks.name: gravityview/maps/choice_marker_icon_settings
hooks.description: Filter the icon settings for a given entry.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Field used to get the choices.

hooks.name: gravityview/maps/field/icon_picker/button_text
gravityview/maps/geocoding/mapquest/licensed_data

parameters.name: licensed_data
parameters.description: True to use MapQuest's licensed endpoints, default is false to use the open endpoints (optional).

hooks.name: gravityview/maps/geocoding/providers/ . $setting . /api_key

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: API key pulled from GravityView Maps settings or a constant

hooks.name: gravityview/maps/geocoding/providers/locale
gravityview/maps/geocoding/providers/region
gravityview/maps/infowindow/content/vars

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The array containing the template tags as keys and the template values as array values

hooks.name: gravityview/maps/infowindow/html

parameters.name: markup
parameters.description: The HTML for the info window markup

hooks.name: gravityview/maps/infowindow/link_target
gravityview/maps/infowindow/pre_html
gravityview/maps/infowindow/pre_html/value/ . $tag

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The content to be shown instead of the [[tag]] placeholder

hooks.name: gravityview/maps/marker/add

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description: The marker about to be added.

hooks.name: gravityview/maps/marker/address
gravityview/maps/marker/field-value

parameters.name: entry
parameters.description: Gravity Forms entry used for the marker

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Gravity Forms Address field object used for the marker

hooks.description: Filters the address field id value.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: string Field ID used to retrieve the map entry icon

hooks.name: gravityview/maps/marker/url

parameters.name: use_default_values
parameters.description: Whether to use default values when generating a marker address

hooks.name: gravityview/maps/render/options
gravityview/maps/request_settings

parameters.description: Should the row be hidden if the value is empty? Default: don't hide.
